title: IIT Bhilai Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Project Engineer Post
description: The Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Bhilai has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Engineer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech, B.E/ B.Tech, MCA, and M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the IIT Bhilai Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can fill out the app...
